items.sentence: The boys playing basketball are my classmates.
I found it difficult to walk in the deep snow.
Tom doesn't know that that won't happen today.
Didn't you know Tom wasn't having a good time?
I'm considering taking a speed reading course.
Would you be so kind as to turn off the radio?
It wasn't just cold outside, but damp as well.
I've heard that you're good at playing tennis.
I'd better get going before it starts raining.
I'm not really into dancing. I prefer singing.
